official-title.#text:
To authorize the Mescalero Apache Tribe to lease
		  adjudicated water rights.

cosponsor.#text:
Ms. Michelle Lujan Grisham of New
			 Mexico

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the
cosponsor.#text:
Mr. Ben Ray Luján of New
			 Mexico

short-title.#text:
Mescalero Apache Tribe Leasing
			 Authorization Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

term.#tail:
means
			 water rights that were adjudicated to the Tribe in State v. Lewis, 116 N.M.
			 194, 861 P. 2d 235 (1993).
means the Secretary of the Interior.
means the State of New Mexico.

header.#text:
Authorization to
			 lease adjudicated water rights

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mescalero Apache Tribe Leasing Authorization Act/s:3/ss:b

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, the Tribe may lease, enter into a contract with
			 respect to, or otherwise transfer to another party, for another purpose, or to
			 another place of use in the State, all or any portion of the adjudicated water
			 rights.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mescalero Apache Tribe Leasing Authorization Act/s:3/ss:c

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, subject to

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, the Tribe
			 shall comply with all laws (including regulations) of the State with respect to
			 the leasing or transfer of water rights.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mescalero Apache Tribe Leasing Authorization Act/s:3/ss:a

text.#text: In carrying out any action under

The
			 Tribe shall not permanently alienate any adjudicated water rights.

The term of any water use lease, contract, or other
			 agreement under this section (including a renewal of such an agreement) shall
			 be not more than 99 years.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall not be liable to the Tribe or any other person for any loss or
			 other detriment resulting from a lease, contract, or other arrangement entered
			 into pursuant to this section.

text.#text:
The authorization provided by this
			 Act for the leasing, contracting, and transfer of the adjudicated water rights
			 shall be considered to satisfy any requirement for authorization of the action
			 by treaty or convention imposed by section 2116 of the Revised Statutes (

header.#text:
Purchases or
			 grants of land from Indians

text.#text:
The nonuse of all or any portion of the adjudicated
			 water rights by a lessee or contractor shall not result in the forfeiture,
			 abandonment, relinquishment, or other loss of all or any portion of the
			 adjudicated water rights.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 1377 IH: Mescalero Apache Tribe Leasing Authorization Act
